name: Detrita Battlegrounds
description: Detrita Battlegrounds is a 2.5D Twin Stick Shooter in Space with pretty art and a pumping soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.8GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 540M 1GB Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: That's my old laptop.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.2GHz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 770 GTX 2GB Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: That's my setup.
